label: applicableCustomsValuation
comment: A cross-border customs valuation applicable to this supply chain consignment.
A customs valuation applicable to this supply chain consignment item.
Customs valuation information applicable to this exchanged declaration.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a goods declaration to customs.
